xdi2.messaging.container.interceptor

Interface OperationInterceptor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Extension<MessagingContainer>, Interceptor<MessagingContainer>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractOperationInterceptor, ConnectInterceptor, ExecuteCommandInterceptor, HasInterceptor, LinkContractInterceptor, LiteralEncryptionInterceptor, PushInInterceptor, PushOutInterceptor, RefInterceptor, SendInterceptor, SigningInterceptor, VariablesInterceptor, WriteListenerInterceptor

    public interface OperationInterceptor
extends Interceptor<MessagingContainer>
    Interceptor that is executed before and after an operation is executed.
    Author:
    markus

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface xdi2.messaging.container.Extension

      • before

        InterceptorResult before(Operation operation,
                         Graph operationResultGraph,
                         ExecutionContext executionContext)
                  throws Xdi2MessagingException
        Run before an operation is executed.
        Parameters:
        operation - The operation to process.
        operationResultGraph - The operation's message result.
        executionContext - The current execution context.
        Returns:
        Interceptor result that specifies how the operation should be further processed.
        Throws:
        Xdi2MessagingException
